Reviews.Title: the pen didn't work
Reviews.Author: egídio Vaz
Reviews.Content: The pen was second hand. I paid for a new one. And obviously, it didn't work. Money lost. I tried to send it back didn't succeed. And I gave up

Reviews.Title: Bad not working
Reviews.Author: Leonides Yabut
Reviews.Content: I charged it and trie to use it but cant make it to work tried to reset but unable to do so. I want my money back!

Reviews.Title: The camera pen
Reviews.Author: AL
Reviews.Content: When I first received the Camera Pen I tested it out. It Worked as I expected. I bought an 8gb memory card for my new toy, however I need to read the instructions a little more careful, or it does not work with the 8gb memory card. It works great with the 2gb memory card.

Reviews.Title: PEN SUCKS
Reviews.Author: EK
Reviews.Content: DOES NOT WORK!  Looks like the instructions were written in Japan by someone who knows a little english. The pen was tried on different computers and it DOES NOT WORK.

Reviews.Title: Defective and not working at all
Reviews.Author: NS
Reviews.Content: I sent the negative feedback to a seller because this pen wasn't working properly as this website says. The camera sucks. When I turn on the video recording the camera starts taking the pics. I removed the feedback upon the seller's request and he sent me an e-mail regarding sending me a free camera gift if I remove the feedback. I checked my in-box folder in the morning and there is no email in my inbox. This is fraud!

Reviews.Title: I'm not there yet
Reviews.Author: Frantz C. Toussaint
Reviews.Content: I bought my mini camara pen and have not been able to make it work yet. I did try the reset, unfortunately without any result yet.Bad news for me: I did not save the address of the sender. I can send it back.

Reviews.Title: Did not work!!! DOA!!!!
Reviews.Author: Javier G. Serrano
Reviews.Content: Did not work right out of box!! Was DOA!! Don't buy!! Save money and buy something else!!! Not worth it!!

Reviews.Title: Works not so much
Reviews.Author: D. Humbert
Reviews.Content: The pen worked for two videos, and had good quality, however it has also produced several corrupted files, and is very unreliable.  Do not buy if you value your data.

Reviews.Title: This product is a lie.
Reviews.Author: Dwyer
Reviews.Content: There may or may not be something resembling a functional image-capturing device built into this pen, which definitely has electronic components and even enough digital existence to install computer drivers, but it refuses to turn on no matter how charged it is, and it is physically impossible to get the SD card that comes with into the slot supposedly designed for it. It is too narrow in every direction. The pen barrel itself is not as wide as the card. And without the card, there is no data storage, and thus the camera-pen is simply a very bad pen with an LED in it and a button on top..For sixteen dollars, this was an acceptable risk, but I'm putting this here to warn other people not to take it.

Reviews.Title: pen worked good but no sd cards came with it
Reviews.Author: COYOTY
Reviews.Content: pen worked good but no sd cards came with it like it says but the pen worked good when i put my own card in it..

Reviews.Title: never worked
Reviews.Author: Pete In Illinois
Reviews.Content: this thing never worked. when charging it, it heated up and got hot. just could not get this thing to work no matter how hard i tried. and the instructions sucked.

Reviews.Title: Poorly made
Reviews.Author: Tammy Cheng
Reviews.Content: This pen broke in 2 days.Poorly made.Not worth a dime.Don't waste your money.Yikes Yikes Yikes Yikes

Reviews.Title: Do NOT buy this...
Reviews.Author: Indy
Reviews.Content: A complete waste of money. I wasn't able to put it to work once. Broke the first time I laid my hands on it! Such a waste of money...

Reviews.Title: scam
Reviews.Author: Petra
Reviews.Content: I THINK THIS IS A SCAM.  THIS PRODUCT HAVEN'T WORKED FOR ME NOR THE Mini Hidden Spy Alarm Desk Clock Nanny Surveillance Camera DVR Motion sound detector

Reviews.Title: JUNK!
Reviews.Author: jamie
Reviews.Content: This didn't work at all....possibly a gimmick!Save your money....should be taken down...too many bad reviews...Got my money back finally!

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work!!!
Reviews.Author: NRV
Reviews.Content: The item doesn't work even after charging for long.. never turns on or operates as indicated in the manual... not sure if resetting while following the instructions for resetting. RETURNING...However I appreciate the  prompt and satisfactory service of returning process by Amazon.com. Navin Vaghela

Reviews.Title: at lease i have a pen
Reviews.Author: Ubaldo Adamez
Reviews.Content: i test it out and it pretty much just what it claim to do...so im ok with the purchase ....

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Ryan Tull
Reviews.Content: While initially capable of recording video, the photos taken by this camera are completely unrecognizable.  After a few rounds of trial and error (the instructions are useless) to learn how it works, it stopped working completely and could not read the sd card.  The exterior construction is also quite poor, it's made of a very flimsy metal and the clip part of the pen almost immediately fell off.

Reviews.Title: horrible
Reviews.Author: Ines Batista
Reviews.Content: Breaks so easy, if i could post photos of how it become crashed, the holder, the pen when u write, the area of the camera moves inside an loose the position to record, the bottom of the top just gone, inside where is the memory its not tight. never will recomend this.

Reviews.Title: This is trash product without quality pass.
Reviews.Author: chunglouie
Reviews.Content: This is the second order from Amazon website of the same product. The image quality is extremely bad. Not even function correctly. sound recording is not accetptable. It should be allowed to sell without the quality pass sticker at all.

Reviews.Title: Skip it
Reviews.Author: wilfred p suozzo
Reviews.Content: It does not work in video mode, single pictures can be taken but there is no indicator to tell you what mode you are in.  I attempted to operate the video for more than a hour following the instructions but it just would not work.  Other problem, unable to change the date stamp.

Reviews.Title: So cool
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Gentry
Reviews.Content: Not only I can write I can also record this is one interesting device I ever had I'm going to take it in my travel

Reviews.Title: Great for all kinds of stuff
Reviews.Author: cutler7711
Reviews.Content: Everyone should own one. Easy to use, always impresses folks when you are asked to document a meeting but don't want a big camera setup

Reviews.Title: upgrade
Reviews.Author: Patrick K.
Reviews.Content: please try to up grsde your technology its a nice but keep on freezing so guys do something i like the vocal part.

Reviews.Title: Good product...
Reviews.Author: Kandi Cowell
Reviews.Content: It's so much cheaper to buy it on here then in a spy store. Has the best quility in pic, recordes real great!!! Has awesome sound!! I would buy it again if i need another one.

Reviews.Title: PEN DOESN'T WORK .. ONLY TAKES PICTURE AND NO VIDEO
Reviews.Author: VICTOR CASTRO
Reviews.Content: THIS PEN AND S9D Micro SD Sunglasses MP3 Player DVR Mini Camera Camcorder Video Recorder...DOES NOT WORK ... THE 3 DASH CAM WORKS FANTASTIC ...

Reviews.Title: Instructions are not fool proof
Reviews.Author: Major
Reviews.Content: Some attempt should have been made to test the instructions on a sample of potential users.I couldn't follow the instructions that came on the sheet of paper packed with the camera pen.I had other problems.  I could not screw the top back on straight.There is on-line help.  I have not tried this yet.

Reviews.Title: Bad instructions"
Reviews.Author: karl a. jicha
Reviews.Content: Instructions for operation were so small I could not read even with a magnifying glass ! What to here it sits of no use and no way for to return it. ,Thanks anyway, this is the first time I purchased  from Amazon that been a disappointment!

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY  PURE CRAP
Reviews.Author: HOPY
Reviews.Content: doesnt work pieces missing  dont BUY DONT BUY.THE ONLY THING  I HAVE EVER BOUGHT FROM AMAZON THAT IS PURE CRAP

Reviews.Title: Horrible!
Reviews.Author: j.bailey
Reviews.Content: This was a big waste of money because it didn't come with everything to make it work! There was two things missing, one of them was the disc! The pen was cheaply made and didn't even write!

Reviews.Title: FINE
Reviews.Author: Miguel Angel Pomier Medina
Reviews.Content: very good product,I am satisfied with the purchaseI can recommend this product, the standard is very good and fulfilled my expectations.

Reviews.Title: It just wouldn't work
Reviews.Author: M. Shults
Reviews.Content: I got a bad one, I guess. It just wouldn't work. It would take still photos, but I couldn't get it to work for videos. I couldn't really tell if it just generated bad files that couldn't play all the way through, or would just quit recording at some arbitrary point less than a minute into the video, or both; but it just didn't work. I returned it.

Reviews.Title: it wasnt sent with a manual
Reviews.Author: shiratsvi
Reviews.Content: i guess the person who sold it to me thought it was simple and didnt need an explanation, but obviously i did. its useless and hanging in my room for no reason.

Reviews.Title: Not happy
Reviews.Author: Dyan Nickerson
Reviews.Content: This mini camera pen was a definite disappointment.  The idea was good, the execution a failure.  There is no way to tell if you are actively recording, if you have taken a picture or if it was working in general without the cumbersome job of taking it apart and hooking it up to the computer via the USB port.  The top where the clicker to "start" it easily fell out (the on/off button in your picture), and the inside was not stable.  So while forced to disassemble to 1) check to see if recording, etc., or 2) download the video, if any, by disassembling made the pen vulnerable to damage and loss.  Only the low cost prevented me from taking the time and postage for returning it for a refund. It was thrown out as useless.

Reviews.Title: Great price!
Reviews.Author: Tim Watson
Reviews.Content: Not the best video quality unless it has very little movement, otherwise it is not bad, but does have some issues with recording video about 2G mem card.

Reviews.Title: the pen doesn't work
Reviews.Author: Mohammad
Reviews.Content: the pen doesn't work.. I charge it more then 12 hours and still doesn't work. the gran light didn't show up at all.

Reviews.Title: Price was good, but..
Reviews.Author: Philip Ulzheimer
Reviews.Content: The price for this camera was great, but it just doesn't work. When it does record, which it doesn't always do, most of the recordings do not play.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use and generates good quality video
Reviews.Author: BK
Reviews.Content: After use of 3-4 times, it seems clarity is good enough to use the videos. Voice captured is also enough to understand the conversations. Given the price of this, product is a must buy if you are looking for buying such device.

Reviews.Title: Its okay
Reviews.Author: Ed
Reviews.Content: great for taking still shots, but the battery has to be recharged every ten minutes which takes the practicality lld use away from desired portability.

Reviews.Title: Didn't function; missing parts
Reviews.Author: S. Winland "DJ Shooter"
Reviews.Content: Memory card was not even included as promised...was not in pen or in the box.Even with my own memory card in, it would not shoot still pics at all, just video (which is also useless, as they're so grainy as to be unwatchable - and that's when the horrible frame rate doesn't simply cause the video player to shut down.)The previous generation of the same pen actually worked & was a fun toy - even though the video was just as useless, and the pictures files were somehow simultaneously huge AND pixelated (didn't know that was possible). In full-sun lighting (& being VERY still) you could take a pic comparable to an early camera phone.Amazon return was easy & free.

Reviews.Title: pen camera
Reviews.Author: Brenda P.
Reviews.Content: We can not figure out how to work it and it came with very little instructions.  The instruction even refer to two buttons and there is only one so not sure they are for this item.  So it just sits on the counter not being used.

Reviews.Title: Spy Pen its not.
Reviews.Author: Santiago Velazquez
Reviews.Content: No 2GB card received. No instructions or box. Not compatible with any of my computers. Would not open up in any app I tried.

Reviews.Title: Dont buy it !
Reviews.Author: Shiju SN
Reviews.Content: I got a second hand pen which was not working ! It never turned on and I had to return it ...Never buy this item..

Reviews.Title: campen
Reviews.Author: robert l.
Reviews.Content: Only worked a couple of minutes just like other reviews stated, look for something else, this item isn't very good

Reviews.Title: never worked
Reviews.Author: hmb prius
Reviews.Content: similar to the other comment on a similar page with a 4gb card (which I missed-lesson learned ALWAYS read reviews of similar products)-this pen is a piece of junk. Never worked. Light came on but wouldn't hold charge, never took a picture or video. Only saving grace is the amazon return policy, but waiting to see what shipping is going to cost.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Georgeanna A.
Reviews.Content: The videos are clear, The images are great.The only problem I have with the camera is bad instructions, I did not get clear instructions on how to use the camera, I had to play around with the pen to find out how to operate it. I did not get a video with instructions. The only instructions I got was a small piece of paper with instructions in chinese  I want to change the date stamp I have not yet been able  to figure out how to do this.  If there is a video with instructions on how to change the date and time please send it.

Reviews.Title: THE SD CARD DOESN'T EVEN STICK IN THE SLOT.
Reviews.Author: Jay Charavda
Reviews.Content: The SD card just slides in and out of the slot. Once inserted in the slot, the pen doesn't close. When turned on, the LED lights 3 times (SD card not found) and turns off. Total waste of money!

Reviews.Title: works good
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: Works good for the price but had to glue the pens clip back on the pen first time i used it.

Reviews.Title: Great buy for the price
Reviews.Author: walter flood
Reviews.Content: Was impressed when I ordered I wasn't expecting top end vidio out of it which well it's not it is surprisingly better than expected sound quality is good the clip keeps trying to fall off but otherwise all around for the price a good buy.

Reviews.Title: POS
Reviews.Author: Pattycakes1111
Reviews.Content: The pen arrived quickly, and broke even quicker. Got one good video out of it, then started a second and when I uploaded to my computer I noticed that half the frame is blurred and has a pink tint, and the other half is clear--cleaning the lens off with a cotton swab didn't have any effect). The clip broke off on my third attempt. Just from clipping it onto my shirt pocket.You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: Scott Porter
Reviews.Content: the one that i was sent is a piece of junk. instructions are not clear. do not buy this product

Reviews.Title: cute pen & cammera
Reviews.Author: G. Dern "Fae"
Reviews.Content: arrived on time kinda cute justwaitting to try it out i got this for hubby for xmas ill keep you all updated

Reviews.Title: wouldnt buy again
Reviews.Author: M. Roth "andymike65"
Reviews.Content: I was not happy, very grainy photos and volume was not loud..looks obvious. Would not buy again. Buy a better one.

Reviews.Title: Takes pictures, that's about it
Reviews.Author: Timothy D. Legg
Reviews.Content: The video works, but the files are corrupt.  Plays very fast (about 8x speed) with squeaky sounds representing voice.  The video behaves similarly with default video players in 32-bit Windows 7 as well as in 64-bit Debian Linux 6.0.  In linux, only half the video will even play before the player quits the file and notifies that the video is invalid.The pictures are sort of clear.The date is wrong, even with the time.txt file that was already there (with a date of May 1, 2012) the pictures are still dated 4/15/2008. The previous person whom put the file there apparently didn't get it right either.The device is unacceptable for me.

Reviews.Title: Great video pen
Reviews.Author: Sinnea T.
Reviews.Content: This product works great. The audio and video is far more advanced than I thought it would be. I received this product in a very timely manner. The instructions made it very easy to start using it right away. If I can find another pen in a different color I will buy it as well.

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk
Reviews.Author: MSNELSON
Reviews.Content: These things never did work.  The instructions are horribly written and they cost way too much for the service that you don't get from them.  Total rip off.

Reviews.Title: Had to send it back
Reviews.Author: Vernon Smith
Reviews.Content: Never could charge and/or make it work. I would have tried another one but just haven't had the time. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Bad quality
Reviews.Author: Esther Stark
Reviews.Content: I was really excited by this cool purchase but was very disappointed when i received it. The quality was very poor. Is there anyway i can get a refund for it?Thanks! Not such a satisfied custoemr.Esty Stark

Reviews.Title: TRASH
Reviews.Author: Bernardo A. Gutierrez
Reviews.Content: This pen did not work at all. When I reviewed what I had "filmed," the grainy image showed as if I was waving the pen around wildly, when I had been holding it still. Only filmed for several seconds before not saving what was recorded! BUY AT YOUR OWN RISK!

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: wood lam
Reviews.Content: This is a good product,is good when compare with other with this price,I am satisfied.I give it five stats and praise.

Reviews.Title: Good gift
Reviews.Author: Anastasia
Reviews.Content: Cool gift, nice toy. Looks good, bit heavy but you'll never notice its not a only pen... Good stuff, really.

Reviews.Title: pen camera
Reviews.Author: JACK WIEMERT
Reviews.Content: Good idea but difficult to use. It is hard to get it pointed in the right direction and and getting what you want on camera. One big drawback is that a lot of shirts are coming without chest pockets to put the pen in.

Reviews.Title: Mini Camera Pen
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: This item is very bad....It does not work and when I received it the memory card was damaged and it did not work at all.  The package looked like it was a used product even though i purchased it as new.  I would not recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: DOES NOT WORK
Reviews.Author: Annette
Reviews.Content: This produced did not work unable to set or reset will not turn on my son was very unhappy with this produce we would like to send it back for a refund or for one that works unable to get a hold of customer service

Reviews.Title: Cute
Reviews.Author: Dennis Manley
Reviews.Content: For the price it made me feel like James Bond. The instruction was hard to understand but I figured them out.

Reviews.Title: Problem
Reviews.Author: Ali
Reviews.Content: ProblemThere are six pack without Memory mean six product without Memory ... Pen and USB onlyI did not find the bill in the Fund also

Reviews.Title: poor item
Reviews.Author: luvergirl
Reviews.Content: This gadet only worked 1 time. I was very disappointed. I saw a similar item at Brookstone...guess I shoul've gotten it there.

Reviews.Title: bad
Reviews.Author: Benjamin
Reviews.Content: effect is not a big deal with the sdcard I think it was a waste of time and money and gits hot

Reviews.Title: Worst Store Ever
Reviews.Author: Brandon Le
Reviews.Content: The unit comes defected.  The charging light came up when plugged in but got nothing work.  I tried everything possible to get it to record and nothing work.  I tried returning the item and til now, I still have not got any refunds.I will never purchase anything else from this store.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money!
Reviews.Author: Philip Dover
Reviews.Content: It's garbage.  Apparently it was used because it had an old picture on it from several years ago.  Don't buy!

Reviews.Title: mini pen cam
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Ordered one and it arrived broke the button to start/stop recording didnt work.  They sent me another one and it doesn't work either.

Reviews.Title: Just okay
Reviews.Author: Lynne Rey
Reviews.Content: I've tried a few of these spy pens. This was performed just okay. Video was kinda crappy quality and really shaky. Also the pen felt like it was really poorly constructed. I wouldn't recommend this one to anyone. I sent mine back for a refund.

Reviews.Title: Get what you pay for?
Reviews.Author: Nancy Sweeney
Reviews.Content: The camera worked really well and for the money you can’t go wrong, however, be careful, as I spend some more money on an 8GB memory card and the pen only works with a 2 GB card. That said, it did work very well with the correct memory card and the instructions are easy to understand. If I can get another pen in a different colour I will as soon as I can.

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE
Reviews.Author: Gladys Montenegro
Reviews.Content: Excelente producto, fácil de usar y muy buena resolución de imagen, lo recomiendo plenamente, no lo había calificado por que LIBERTY me lo entrego muy tarde, a  pesar que el vendedor lo despacho a tiempo. Gracias

ProductInfo.Features:
Produce high res color photo, 3840x2880 resolution of JPG format
Video recording with 960x720 video resolution and 30 FPS of AVI format
Built-in micro DVR;HD camera effects;3 megapixels camera;
2 GB internal memory with micro SD Slot expandable to 8gb
ProductInfo.Name: 2GB Card + Mini Camera Cam Pen Hidden Video Camera Recorder DV DVR ,Support Micro Sd Card 4GB 8GB
